attributes.name: calloutVariant
attributes.description: Define the context and colour of the callout modal. It is required when type is set to callout.

attributes.name: open
attributes.description: Controls if modal is visible or not

attributes.name: closable
attributes.description: Show close icon and allow clicking the background to close the modal

attributes.name: _close
attributes.description: Dispatched when modal is closable and is closed

attributes.name: actions
attributes.description: Buttons displayed in the bottom right of the modal instead of a close icon
